org.gjt.sp.jedit
Class JARClassLoader

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.ClassLoader
        |
        +--org.gjt.sp.jedit.JARClassLoader
public class JARClassLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader

A class loader implementation that loads classes from JAR files.

Version:
$Id: JARClassLoader.java,v 1.22 2003/02/07 17:42:30 spestov Exp $
Author:
Slava Pestov

Constructor Detail

JARClassLoader

public JARClassLoader()
This constructor creates a class loader for loading classes from all plugins. For example BeanShell uses one of these so that scripts can use plugin classes.

JARClassLoader

public JARClassLoader(java.lang.String path)
               throws java.io.IOException

closeZipFile

public void closeZipFile()
Closes the ZIP file. This plugin will no longer be usable after this.
